sentences.sentence: AIM: to investigate the mechanisms of augmenter of liver regeneration (ALR) in promoting damaged hepatocyte proliferation.
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨肝细胞增殖因子(alr)促进受损肝细胞增殖的可能机制。

sentences.sentence: Objective To observe the effects of recombinant augmenter of liver regeneration (ALR) on the proliferation of hepatic stellate cell line IG12 and ECM synthesis.
sentences.translation: 目的观察重组大鼠肝再生增强因子(alr)对肝星状细胞株ig12增殖及细胞外基质合成的影响，探讨其抗肝纤维化作用的可能机制。

sentences.sentence: Objective To select an optimal combined set of carrier, introducing route and dose of recombinant plasmid of augmenter of liver regeneration (ALR) for ALR gene therapy.
sentences.translation: 目的筛选肝再生增强因子重组质粒基因治疗时较优的载体、途径和剂量及三者的最佳组合。
